slider1.text2: The invaluable benefits of dry fruits!
slider1.title: Go dried fruits

slider2.text2: The perfect way to sweeten your day!
slider2.title: Go to the jams

dryFruitsTitle.title: Dried fruits
dryFruitsTitle.content1: The fruit season is too short and most varieties of fruit cannot be brought to the next season.
dryFruitsTitle.content2: In order to preserve natures gift to us, people have found several ways to get ready for winter.
dryFruitsTitle.content3: One of them was the preparation of dried fruits.
dryFruitsTitle.content4: As the fruits are not exposed to heat, the advantage of dried fruits is that they preserve almost all useful substances.

accordion1.title: 1. Dried fruits are high in fiber.
accordion1.content1: They clean out the gut, normalize the digestive system, and accelerate metabolism.
accordion1.content2: With a small portion of product, you can feel full for a long time.
accordion1.content3: It could be consumed instead of a snack at work or on a trip.

accordion2.title: 2. Most dried fruits contain vitamins
accordion2.content1: PP, A, B, phosphorus, magnesium, calcium, fructose, and organic acids.
accordion2.content2: Dried fruits are rich in useful substances.
accordion2.content3: Thanks to these, they strengthen immunity and strengthen resistance against vitamin deficiency and anemia.

accordion3.title: 3. Potassium
accordion3.content1: Regulates blood pressure and relaxes the walls of blood vessels.

accordion4.title: 4. Drieds
accordion4.content1: Dried apples, pears, and dates are indispensable during a diet.
accordion4.content2: They have fewer calories, but they help keep hunger under control for a long time.

accordion5.title: 5. Antioxidant properties
accordion5.content1: The antioxidant properties of raisins and plums are well known.
accordion5.content2: They are able to prevent the formation of cancer cells, remove toxins from the intestines, destroy pathogenic bacteria and normalize microflora.
